mapper.select: SELECT p.posting_id, p.title, p.contents, p.views, m.nickname, i.image_url, p.register_time from posting as p INNER JOIN member as m on p.member_id = m.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN image as i on i.posting_id = p.posting_id WHERE p.posting_id = #{postingId};
SELECT a.posting_id postingId,b.nickname nickName,a.title title, a.contents contents,a.register_time registerTime,a.views views FROM posting a, member b WHERE a.member_id = b.member_id
